title: WebSocket Events Guide for Frontend Development
description: Complete guide for handling new WebSocket events related to garbage recycling and item redemption

item_redeemed.description: Fired when a player successfully recycles an item from their inventory into a matching bin
item_redeemed.trigger: When garbage detection finds matching bins and recycles items

data.matchId: string - ID of the current match
data.playerId: string - ID of the player who redeemed the item

item.name: string - Name of the recycled item (e.g., 'plastic bottle')

data.message: ‚ôªÔ∏è Recycled plastic water bottle - CO‚ÇÇ saved: 0.5kg (25 points)

frontendHandling.display: Show success animation with item name and points earned
frontendHandling.inventory: Remove the item from player's inventory UI

items_collected.description: Fired when a player collects garbage items but no matching bins are available
items_collected.trigger: When garbage detection finds items but no compatible bins

data.matchId: string - ID of the current match
data.playerId: string - ID of the player who collected items

items.name: string - Name of the collected item

data.pointsEarned: number - Total points earned (20 per item)

frontendHandling.display: Show collection animation with items collected
frontendHandling.inventory: Add items to player's inventory UI

recycledItems.description: Items recycled into matching bins get minimum 15 points or CO‚ÇÇ * 50, whichever is higher

collectedItems.description: Items collected without matching bins get 20 points each

uiComponents.recyclingAnimation: Show checkmark + recycling symbol + points earned
uiComponents.collectionAnimation: Show plus symbol + items count + points earned
uiComponents.notifications: Toast messages with item details and points
uiComponents.inventoryUpdates: Real-time inventory add/remove with smooth animations
uiComponents.scoreDisplay: Animated score counter showing point increases

testScenarios: Scan image with recyclable items and matching bins
Scan image with items but no matching bins
Scan image with mixed items (some match, some don't)
Verify score calculations match backend logic
expectedBehaviors: Recycled items: Remove from inventory, show success animation
Collected items: Add to inventory, show collection animation
Score updates: Real-time score counter with point animations
Notifications: Clear feedback for all actions

breakingChanges.description: New WebSocket events added - no breaking changes to existing functionality
breakingChanges.migration: Simply add the new event handlers to existing WebSocket message processing
breakingChanges.backwardCompatibility: All existing events continue to work as before

completeFlow.description: Example of complete user interaction flow
steps: 1. Player scans image with garbage and bins
3. Backend matches items to bins and recycles them
4. Backend sends 'item_redeemed' events for each recycled item
5. Backend sends 'items_collected' event for unmatched items
6. Frontend shows animations and updates UI
7. Player sees updated score and inventory
